Author: fishonthesun
Text: It is so easy to forget these things. If you think it would help, try finding an app that can give you customized notifications that will remind you of these things. I hope you continue to kick ass and recover. We are all here for you and proud of everything you're doing and have done. It can feel lonely but reaching out can be so helpful. Feel free to DM me anytime just to vent or anything.  Hope I'm not being weird or overbearing, I just feel so much empathy for everyone here and want you to continue to heal!!!  Good luck!!

Author: brutalbabyboy
Text: you deserve to feel strong and be healthy
